aaanalysis.plot_get_cdict

aaanalysis.plot_get_cdict(name=None)[source][source]

Retrieve color dictionaries specified for AAanalysis.

Parameters
namestr, {‘DICT_COLOR’, ‘DICT_SCALE_CAT’}

The name of default color dictionaries for plots (e.g., bars in CPPPlot.profile) and scale categories (e.g., CPPPlot.heatmap), respectively.

Returns
cmapdict

Specific AAanalysis color dictionary.
